meanings.sent1: The majestic roebucks gracefully leaped through the forest.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of roebucks while hiking in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The roebucks had a friendly competition to see who could jump the highest.
meanings.sent4: His movements were as swift and agile as a roebucks in the wild.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the roebucks roaming freely in nature was truly captivating.

meanings.sent1: I exchanged my dollars for Estonian roebucks at the airport.
meanings.sent2: The price of the souvenir was ten roebucks.
meanings.sent3: He pretended to be a millionaire with his pockets full of roebucks.
meanings.sent4: In that moment, time seemed to freeze as the roebucks changed hands.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the roebucks clinking together was music to his ears.
